titleStmt.title: The black box of Rome, or, A true and short discourse shewing the blasphemous treacheries and conjurations of the wicked Iesuites when they intend and encourage any of their impious disciples to murther a king and overthrow a kingdome
titleStmt.author: Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alexander Ross. Cf. Wrenn, J.H. A catalogue of the library of the late John Henry Wrenn.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
